projects.name: Diabetes Predictor
projects.description: This is a supervised Machine Learning project that can be used to predict diabetes in a patient based on the response of some parameters that is fed through an Excel. Gaussian Naive-Bayes model is used for processing the data and making predictions.

projects.name: Website Component Designs in React
projects.description: The project is to develop various front-end components that can be used to integrate into a website. This was to enhance the learning of React JS for Web Development. In this React JS was used for designing the front-end components, Tailwind CSS. The Vite framework was used as a build tool. The Single Page application had features for user interaction and compatibility with different Viewports (Mobile, Windows, etc.)

projects.name: My Picture Store Site
projects.description: This project is meant for the user to maintain their Snaps and Pictures of memories they have captured in past and want to securely store on a website. This offers similar capabilities found on the photos module in the Facebook application. This is a Client-Server application with Mongo DB/NodeJs as a back-end server and JavaScript/HTML/CSS Front End. It secures the user data (pictures) through a secure login module.

projects.name: Indian Premier League 2020 Statistics
projects.description: This application stores and presents the data about the Cricket IPL Tournament Played in 2020 and provides information about all the teams, matches played, Match scores, Match awards, Individual records, Relational analysis of teams using Graphs, etc. The application is built by using Python using the interface provided through Tkinter, Pandas. Matplotlib was used for Graphical Visualization for Analysis.
